name: Quantum Tic Tac Toe (dbroemme)
description: Tic Tac Toe like you have never seen it before. In the quantum version, you get to make two moves on each turn. You play multiple potential games at once until there is a conflict that must be resolved. See if you can beat the computer in advanced mode once you get the hang of the game. Its not as easy as you think, and there will a lot of ties like in the classic version until you advance your skills to the next level.
